thread.title: Disgraced Conrad Murray 'wants to help Paris Jackson' solve dad Michael's 'murder'
thread.title_full: Disgraced Conrad Murray 'wants to help Paris Jackson' solve dad Michael's 'murder'

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Disgraced Conrad Murray 'wants to help Paris Jackson' solve dad Michael's 'murder'
text:
Disgraced Conrad Murray 'wants to help Paris Jackson' solve dad Michael's 'murder' The doctor was convicted of involuntary manslaughter of the singer's death in 2009   Thank you for subscribing!   
Disgraced doctor Conrad Murray reportedly wants to help Paris Jackson solve her father Michael's alleged murder. 
It has been claimed that Murray - who was convicted of involuntary manslaughter over the singer's death in 2009 - wants to help 18-year-old Paris "pursue her theory" that her dad was murdered . 
According to the New York Daily News, the late star's former personal doctor wants to reconnect with Jacko's children - although it is said the family want nothing to do with him. Conrad Murray reportedly wants to help Paris (Photo: WENN) She has alleged her father was murdered (Photo: Getty) 
"He wants to meet Paris to tell her that he will back her in any plans she has to get justice for Michael," the source said, before adding: "They all hold him responsible for Michael's death and have nothing but disdain for him.” 
The insider claimed: "Murray has been out for number one since day one of meeting Michael — nothing has changed. Paris sees right through him.” 
It comes after Paris claimed Jackson did not die from an overdose of the anaesthetic drug propofol drug administered by Dr Conrad Murray, who was later convicted of his involuntary manslaughter. He died in 2009 (Photo: REUTERS) 
Describing the Thriller star’s death as a “setup”, Paris told Rolling Stone: “It’s obvious. All arrows point to that [him being murdered]. 
"It sounds like a total conspiracy theory and it sounds like bulls***, but all real fans and everybody in the family knows it. It was a setup. It was bulls***,” she adds that “a lot of people” wanted him dead . Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
